bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and System for Using a Bayesian Belief Network to Ensure Data Integrity

abstract.p: The present invention relates to a method and system for assessing the risks and/or exposures associated with financial transactions using various statistical and probabilistic techniques. Specifically, the present invention relates to a method and system for identifying plausible sources of error in data used as input to financial risk assessment systems using Bayesian belief networks as a normative diagnostic tool to model relationships between and among inputs/outputs of the risk assessment system and other external factors.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Using a Baysian belief network to ensure data integrity

abstract.p: A system assess the risks and/or exposures associated with financial transactions using various statistical and probabilistic techniques. Specifically, plausible sources of error in data used as input to financial risk assessment systems are identified using Bayesian belief networks as a normative diagnostic tool to model relationships between and among inputs/outputs of the risk assessment system and other external factors.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR USING BAYESIAN BELIEF NETWORK TO GUARANTEE COMPLETENESS OF DATA

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a method and a system which evaluate risk and/or exposure relating to banking transactions by using various statistical techniques and probablistic methods. SOLUTION: A Bayesian belief network is used as an exemplary diagnosing tool which models the relation between the input and output of a risk evaluation system and between them and other external factors in a financial risk evaluation system to find a likelihood information source of an error of data inputted to the financial risk evaluation system.
